main event: Two round flares, similar in appearance to baseballs, were observed dropped from an aircraft 20 minutes apart in Newark Valley, New York.
interesting points: The observation lasted for about 20 minutes with the flares dropped 20 minutes apart., The size of the flares was comparable to that of a baseball., Although no aircraft was visually observed, the sound of an aircraft was heard., The report concluded that the sightings were likely caused by flares., The incident occurred on September 9, 1952.
